TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityWithKey

Docs.summary: Defines an entity type that exposes an entity key.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This interface is used to expose the entity key to Object Services.
Object Services uses the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithKey.EntityKey%2A> property to manage objects in the object context.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the for instances of entity types that implement this interface.
Docs.value: The for instances of entity types that implement this interface.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Object Services uses the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithKey.EntityKey%2A> property to manage objects in the object context.
For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).
